fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Flare Blitz** Deal an Attack to a player. You choose the value of this attack. You will get hit back with an attack aswell depending on the value you chose. Basic and lower: None. Powerful: Basic. Unstoppable: Powerful. Overkill: Unstoppable. Higher than Overkill: Overkill.
**Bulk Up** - Raise your Attack and Defense by one for tonight.
**Work Up** - Raise your Attack.
-(Zen Mode) **Future Sight** - Pick a player. The night after using this ability, they are dealt an Astral Unstoppable Attack.
-(Zen Mode) **Extrasensory** Deal an Astral Basic Attack that bypasses base defense, but not granted defense.
-(Zen Mode) **Psywave** Deal An Astral Basic Attack that bypasses granted defense, but not base defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You cannot use your Zen Mode abilities if you are not in Zen Mode. You cannot use your non-Zen Mode abilities if you are in Zen Mode.

fields.name: Pokémon Ability:
fields.value: **Zen Mode** After you successfully raise your attack higher than your defense by one tier twice, enter Zen Mode
